sentences.sContent: He leaned forward , his elbows resting on the table.
sentences.sCn: 他身体前倾，胳膊肘撑在桌子上。

sentences.sContent: I felt that at last I could begin to look forward .
sentences.sCn: 我觉得自己终于可以开始向前看了。

sentences.sContent: Would you make sure that you forward my mail promptly?
sentences.sCn: 请您一定及时转寄我的信，好吗？

phrases.pCn: v. 提出；拿出；放出；推举出

涌现；自告奋勇；被提出来讨论

trans.tranOther: towards a place or position that is in front of you
to send letters, goods etc to someone when they have moved to a different address
